tigercontrol.environments package¶

core¶

This is a core

Environment()

custom¶

tigercontrol.environments.CustomEnvironment() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
tigercontrol.environments.register_custom_environment(…) Description: global custom environment controller

control¶

tigercontrol.environments.ControlEnvironment() Description: class for online control tests
tigercontrol.environments.controller.LDS_Control() Description: Simulates a linear dynamical system.
tigercontrol.environments.controller.LSTM_Control() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
tigercontrol.environments.controller.RNN_Control() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
tigercontrol.environments.controller.CartPole() Description:
tigercontrol.environments.controller.DoublePendulum() Acrobot is a 2-link pendulum with only the second joint actuated.

time_series¶

tigercontrol.environments.TimeSeriesEnvironment() Description: class for online control tests
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.SP500() Description: Outputs the daily opening price of the S&P 500 stock market index from January 3, 1986 to June 29, 2018.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.UCI_Indoor() Description: Outputs various weather metrics from a UCI dataset from 13/3/2012 to 11/4/2012
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.ENSO() Description: Collection of monthly values of control indices useful for predicting La Nina/El Nino.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.Crypto() Description: Outputs the daily price of bitcoin from 2013-04-28 to 2018-02-10
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.Random() Description: A random sequence of scalar values taken from an i.i.d.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.LQR() Description: Simulates an autoregressive moving-average time-series.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.Unemployment() Description: Monthly unemployment rate since 1948.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.LDS_TimeSeries() Description: Simulates a linear dynamical system.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.LSTM_TimeSeries() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
tigercontrol.environments.time_series.RNN_TimeSeries() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.

tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Simulator([env])
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Ant([env]) Description: Simulates a minitaur environment
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.CartPole() Description: Simulates a pendulum balanced on a cartpole.
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.CartPoleDouble() Descrtion: Simulates a pendulum balanced on a cartpole.
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.CartPoleSwingup() Description: Simulates a pendulum balanced on a cartpole.
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.HalfCheetah([env]) Description: Simulates a minitaur environment
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Humanoid([env]) Description: Simulates a minitaur environment
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Kuka() Description: Simulates a kuka arm picking up diverse objects
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.KukaDiverse() Description: Simulates a kuka arm picking up diverse objects
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Minitaur([env]) Description: Simulates a minitaur environment
tigercontrol.environments.pybullet.Obstacles() Description: Simulates a obstacles avoidance environment
